duties_responsibilities.duty: Spearhead the Design Control Process and ensure compliance with regulations and customer needs.
Work cross-functionally to ensure Design Quality Process Requirements are met, utilizing validation, verification, and other means.
Manage DHF files on Engineering projects within the firm, adhering to all regulations and guidelines.
Review and Approve Change Notices, finding process improvements throughout the design phase of the product.
Be the Subject Matter Expert on all aspects of Design Quality and provide assistance throughout the process.

education_certification.credential: BS in Engineering Field with 5+ years of related experience. Working knowledge of 21 CFR Part 820, ISO 13485, and ISO 14971. Minitab experience is preferred, or use of similar statistical analysis tools. Gage R&R experience in Medical Device is preferred.
